data.title: Here are the films of Kamal Haasan that were nominated to the Oscars
data.meta_description: Kamal Haasan is now basking in the success of the film ‘Vikram’. He will soon be shooting for his film ‘Inidian 2’. Kamal Haasan is one of the leading actors of India and is also a producer, director, singer, lyricist and screen writer. As an individual he has received four National Film Awards. With being active in the film industry for more than 5 decades, Kamal Haasan is one of the first few actors whose films had been sent to represent at the Oscars.Here are the films of Kamal Haasan that has entered the Oscars nomination for Best Foreign Movie!‘Cobra’ box office collection day 2: The film minted less than Rs 6 crore on Thursday(Image: Facebook)
data.text:
Kamal Haasan is now basking in the success of the film ‘Vikram’. He will soon be shooting for his film ‘Inidian 2’. Kamal Haasan is one of the leading actors of India and is also a producer, director, singer, lyricist and screen writer. As an individual he has received four National Film Awards. With being active in the film industry for more than 5 decades, Kamal Haasan is one of the first few actors whose films had been sent to represent at the Oscars.

Here are the films of Kamal Haasan that has entered the Oscars nomination for Best Foreign Movie!

‘Cobra’ box office collection day 2: The film minted less than Rs 6 crore on Thursday

(Image: Facebook)

The film directed by cinematographer PC Sriram is a violent action film and it stars Kamal Haasan, Nasser and Arjun in the lead roles. It is the remake of the Hindi film ‘Drohkaal’. The film is about two police officials played by Kamal Haasan and Arjun who seek to curb a naxalite terrorist group and their leader played by Nasser.

Yuvan Shankar Raja expresses his desire to act in a biopic!

(Image: Facebook)

Directed by Mani Ratnam, the film is an action crime and it features Kamal Haasan and Saranya in the lead role. The film revolves around Kamal who plays the role of Velu Naicker who acts as the voice of the people settled in the Dharavi slums. Starting with selling drugs, Kamal’s power and command increases in the area and he is the huge support that the local people have.

'Ponniyin Selvan' makers release poster revealing looks of Sarathkumar and Parthiban

(Image: Facebook)
